bill.title: Relating To Health.
bill.description: Requires the department of health and Oahu regional health care system to develop a strategic plan for the utilization of all Oahu regional health care system facilities and report to the legislature prior to the regular session of 2024. Extends the assimilation of the Daniel K. Akaka state veterans home to 6/30/2024. Requires the Oahu regional health care system and the department of defense to provide a joint progress report to the legislature regarding construction of and the hiring of an operator for the Daniel K. Akaka state veterans home. Effective 6/30/3000. (HD2)

history.action: Bill scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 02-01-23 11:30AM in conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee recommends that the measure pass with amendments, for recommittal for further consideration. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Takenouchi, Ilagan, Kobayashi, Mizuno, Nishimoto, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Amato.
Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 85) as amended in HD 1, recommending recommittal to HLT for further consideration.
Recommitted to HLT as amended in HD 1 with none voting no and Representative(s) Amato, Kila, Todd excused.
Re-referred to HLT/CMV, FIN, referral sheet 12
Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT/CMV on Wednesday, 02-15-23 11:00AM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Takenouchi, Amato, Ilagan, Kobayashi, Mizuno, Nishimoto, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.

The committee on CMV recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Hashem, Chun, Ganaden, Ichiyama, Morikawa, Poepoe, Takayama, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from HLT/CMV (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 724) as amended in HD 2, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 2 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Marten excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-23-23 1:30PM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 16 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Kitagawa, Aiu, Chun, Cochran, Garrett, Kahaloa, Kila, Kobayashi, Lamosao, Morikawa, Nishimoto, Poepoe, Takenouchi, Alcos, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

subjects.subject_name: Daniel K. Akaka State Veterans Home
